date.description: The date for which the analytics data is recorded.

channel_id.description: The unique identifier for the channel associated with the playlist.

playlist_id.description: The unique identifier for the playlist.

video_id.description: The unique identifier for the video within the playlist.

live_or_on_demand.description: Indicates whether the playlist is for live or on-demand content.

subscribed_status.description: Indicates the subscribed status of viewers interacting with the playlist.

country_code.description: The country code indicating the location where the data is relevant.

views.description: The total number of views the playlist received.

watch_time_minutes.description: The total watch time in minutes accumulated by viewers for the playlist.

average_view_duration_seconds.description: The average duration in seconds that viewers watched the videos in the playlist.

playlist_starts.description: The number of times the playlist was initiated or started by viewers.

playlist_saves_added.description: The number of times the playlist was saved or added to a user's collection.

playlist_saves_removed.description: The number of times the playlist was removed from a user's saved collection.
